name: The Ghost of Paris
description:
Inspired by Edgar Allan Poe's - 'The Murders in the Rue Morgue'.

1840, Summer, Paris. The narrator (Edgar/Ed) and his friend, Auguste de Villepin a.k.a. Devil, who is an investigator, read about a bizarre and gruesome murder. 

Who did it? Is it a human? Or a ghost? If a human did it, how can he disappear from a room which is closed from inside?

The story is about how Ed and Devil solve the mystery.

  • Explore beautiful streets of Paris of the 1940 era
  • All characters in the game have accent as per their nationality in the storyline - English, French, Spanish, Italian
  • In-game hint system, to help you out if you are stuck!

DISCLAIMER: This is inspired by the short story 'The Murders in the Rue Morgue', however in order to gamify the experience and add elements of suspense, certain modifications in the characters, and storyline have been made.

KNOWN ISSUES: If you are not playing with your KeyBoard, but playing on tablet/browser and using mouse click or finger tap, some of the interactive items don't respond. SOLUTION: Just tap on the ground/tile where the character is standing. It is similar to pressing ENTER when standing on a nearby ground.
